title: Novel Graphene-Based Composite for Water Purification
abstract: A composite material comprising graphene oxide and a polymeric substrate for efficient removal of heavy metal ions from water.

title: AI-Powered System for Early Diagnosis of Plant Diseases
abstract: A system using convolutional neural networks (CNNs) to analyze leaf images and detect common plant diseases at an early stage.

title: Biodegradable Packaging Material from Agricultural Waste
abstract: A method for producing biodegradable packaging material from rice husks and other agricultural waste products.
